result.execSummary:
The defendant Steven R. Blanchard was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Steven R. Blanchard is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Steven R. Blanchard was found guilty of Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Cases heard: 14CF425, 14CF215, 14CF98, Defendant Steven R. Blanchard not in Court.  Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin stated her notes stated Atty. Polacek was to have provided a stipulation regarding the jail credit. ADA Long stated she would stipulate to the following jail credit: 14CF425 (4 days) 14CF215 and 14CF98 (3 days in each case). Court granted that credit. JOCs to be amended.

Defendant Steven R. Blanchard in court with attorney Paul Douglas Polacek.  Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rights/Elements, 14 CF 425 Waiver of Right to Prelim filed, Court accepts Waiver, probable cause found, bound over, Information filed, waives reading, Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct.  1 in 12 CF 345, Ct. 1 in 14 CF 215, Ct. 1 in 14 CF 98, Ct. 3 in 14 CF 425, and Ct. 9 in 14 CF 425, Judgment to be entered, 14 CF 98, Ct. 2, 3, 4, and 5, 14 CF 215, Ct. 2, 3, 4, 5, and 6,  14 CF 24, 13 CF 133, 12 CF 278, and 12 CF 425, Ct. 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8 dismissed, Court sentences defendant to:  12 CF 345, Ct. 1, Court withheld sentence, probation 3 years, $518.00 costs, AODA and comply, Defendant to submit DNA Sample, maintain full time employment or schooling, 14 CF 215, Ct. 1, 30 days jail w/Huber, consecutive Huber to include 2 jobs defendant has, Jail start date 2/16/15 at 7:00 P.M., $443.00 costs, 60 days to pay or payment plan, 14 CF 98, Ct. 1, 30 days jail w/Huber, consecutive to 14 CF 215, Huber to include 2 jobs defendant has, $443.00 costs, 60 days to pay or payment plan, 14 CF 425, Ct. 3, Court withheld sentence, probation 3 years, concurrent, $518.00 costs, AODA and comply, Defendant to submit DNA Sample, maintain full time employment or schooling14 CF 425, Ct. 9, 30 days jail w/Huber, consecutive, Huber to include 2 jobs defendant has $443.00 costs, 60 days to pay or payment plan, Court allows $949.80 from defendant's paycheck to be returned
